title: Like watching grass grow
review: It took me 4 goes to get to the end of the movie. Each time was an overwhelming desire to fall asleep. I'm sure long shots of people doing things like sitting down slowly and looking at the hand would be interested to some people, who exactly is a mystery. All I can say is, that's 2hrs 45 mins that was a complete waste of time. I have never been so bored and disappointed by such a hyped up movie since 'The thin red line'. And to compare this movie to that is pretty bad.
